original_text: At this the Jews there began to grumble about him because he said, “I am the bread that came down from heaven.”
korean_text: 자기가 하늘에서 내려온 떡이라 하시므로 유대인들이 예수에 대하여 수군거려

sentences.original_text: At this, the Jews began to grumble about him
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 유대인들이 그에 대해 불평하기 시작했다

sentences.original_text: I am the bread that came down from heaven
